name: Appernetic
description: A Static Site Generator as a Service. Appernetic is a web service for managing and generating static content for GitHub Pages.

name: Automad
description: Automad is a file-based CMS and template engine. It is designed to be fully portable without any dependencies on databases or fixed locations and doesn't require any complicated setup process.

name: BitBalloon
description: A hosting platform for your static sites & apps

name: Blatter
description: Blatter is a tiny tool for creating and publishing static web sites built from dynamic templates.

name: blogc++
description: Just another static blog generator, written in C++17.

name: blosxom
description: Blosxom (pronounced blossom) is a lightweight yet feature-packed weblog application designed from the ground up with simplicity, usability, and interoperability in mind.

name: Divshot
description: Static web Platform-as-a-Service with pushState support.

name: DOS on Dope
description: DOS on DOPE is the modern MVC framework built on the awesome power of Batch scripts.

name: Firedrop2
description: The Blog Tool for Discerning Pythoneers

name: FMPP
description: FreeMarker-based text file PreProcessor

name: gulp-ssg
description: Static site generator plugin for gulp

name: Hammer
description: Super-charge your web development with Hammer. Still using PHP includes for HTML? You're going to love hammer.

name: Maven Site Plugin
description: The Site Plugin is used to generate a site for the project. The generated site also includes the project's reports that were configured in the POM.

name: Olai
description: A blogging platform that integrates with existing blogging editors via XMLRPC/API, generates plain HTML files and automatically pushes these files to Amazon S3 or Github Pages

name: Org Mode
description: Org mode is for keeping notes, maintaining TODO lists, planning projects, and authoring documents with a fast and effective plain-text system.

name: PPWizard
description: Uses classic REXX or Regina interpreter

name: Primoca
description: Static Website Hosting and CDN

name: Pulse CMS
description: The easiest flat-file CMS for designers and their clients

name: Sitebox.io
description: New and intuitive way to create websites with dropbox

name: SiteGen
description: Sitegenerator for Dart

name: Statamic
description: The friendliest CMS you'll ever meet. Powered by flat files, your favorites content parsers, and the raw power of nature.

name: Tagy
description: Fully customizable structure and any params

name: tclog
description: Weblog generator with a GUI editor. Uploads entries via FTP. Features: RSS 1.0, HTML templates, TrackBack, wiki-like formatting, Namazu index creation.

name: Text Assembler
description: A static website generator written in C++ integrating the Google V8 Javascript engine

name: VoodooPad
description: MacOS/iOS application for editing notes. Has a static site publishing functionality extensible via JavaScript.
